text: Concrete Jungle, released in 2010, is the third album by Nigerian-German singer-songwriter Nneka - the album was her first US release. == Track listing == {| class="wikitable" |- !align="center"|# !align="center"|Title !align="center"|Time |- |1 |"Showin' Love" |3:52 |- |2 |"The Uncomfortable Truth" |3:49 |- |3 |"Mind vs. Heart" |4:15 |- |4 |"Heartbeat" |3:11 |- |5 |"Come With Me" |5:24 |- |6 |"Kangpe" (ft. Wesley Williams) |3:59 |- |7 |"Africans" |4:29 |- |8 |"Suffri" |5:54 |- |9 |"From Africa 2 U" |3:53 |- |10 |"Walking" |3:15 |- |11 |"Focus" |4:23 |- |12 |"God of Mercy" |3:29 |- |} == Charts == === Album === {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2010) !align="left"|Peak Position[] |- |align="left"|US Billboard Heatseekers |align="center"|18 |- |align="left"|Billboard R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums |align="center"|57 |- |} === Singles === {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Year !align="left"|Single !align="left"|Chart !align="left"|Peak Position[] |- |align="left"|2010 |align="left"|"Heartbeat" |European Hot 100 |#65 |- |} == References == Category:2010 albums Category:Igbo-language albums Category:Nneka (singer) albums Category:Decon albums
